solution_line_template: Since Calvin loses 10 pounds every month, his total weight loss after one year is {months_per_year}*{pounds_lost_per_month} = <<{months_per_year}*{pounds_lost_per_month}={total_pounds_lost}>>{total_pounds_lost} pounds.
Calvin weighs {initial_weight}-{total_pounds_lost} = <<{initial_weight}-{total_pounds_lost}={final_weight}>>{final_weight} pounds after a year of hitting the gym.
